articles.content: After three months of inaction, Liverpools Premier League title pursuit has been temporarily halted with an unconvincing 0-0 draw against bitter rivals Everton on Monday morning.The Reds only require… [+2998 chars]

articles.description: Scott Barrett faces missing the entire Super Rugby Aotearoa season.
articles.content:
